name: spcgv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Rule of specialization, using implicit substitution. Compare Theorem 7.3 of [Quine] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-1994.)
